content.rendered: Offers single-zone perimeter fencing with up to 8joules of stored power. It can monitor 8km of electric fence installed with 1.6mm HT wire.

excerpt.rendered:
• Battery backup
  • Monitors the fence return voltage (single zone)
  • Alarms on low Voltage threshold
  • Auxiliary alarm input (gate monitor)
  • Siren and strobe output
  • Remote control option
  • 8 Joule and 10KV maximum output
